description: Fixed 3 critical bugs from GPT code review: (1) fast_refs filter SQL placeholder bug in relationships.rs causing zero results due to incorrect IN clause construction (placeholders[1..] dropped ?1), also fixed test data ordering (files before symbols for FK constraints), (2) fast_explore similar mode fallback using bare symbol name instead of build_embedding_text losing signature/docs/type context, (3) fast_explore types mode total_found counting HashMap.len() (always 2) instead of actual parents+children array lengths. All fixes follow TDD methodology, test_fast_refs_reference_kind_filtering now passing.
